Issues May 2025 Ad Specs & Sizes Pickup Locations Search Home Featured THE DELRAY BEACH CLUB: Reimagined By Diane Feen April 1, 2025 Facebook Twitter Pinterest WhatsApp A refreshed coastal retreat awaits. The Delray Beach Club has unveiled its stunning renovation, reimagining the member experience with elevated amenities, refined dining, and an invigorated social scene—all set against the backdrop of 3.5 acres of pristine oceanfront. Designed for those who seek the perfect balance of leisure and activity, the club’s refreshed ambiance effortlessly integrates indoor and outdoor spaces. Whether basking in the serenity of the oceanfront pool, embracing high-energy tennis and fitness programs, or indulging in premiere coastal dining, every moment is crafted to inspire. CULINARY EXCELLENCE & ELEVATED EXPERIENCES With a redefined culinary program, members can indulge in a variety of dining experiences— from a relaxed, coastal-inspired casual gatherings and sunset dinners in REEF, to an elegant fine dining experience with oceanfront views, gourmet dishes, and expertly paired wines in BLEU. And our lively outdoor dining space, featuring casual bites, refreshing drinks, and a vibrant social atmosphere at HIGH TIDES. At the helm of this exciting evolution is our new Executive Chef, David Morales, whose expertise and creativity bring a fresh perspective to our kitchens. Under his leadership, our dining venues offer elevated menus, innovative flavors, and a commitment to exceptional quality that enhances every meal. Beyond dining, the Delray Beach Club is a place where families create lasting memories. Members can enjoy an exciting calendar of events designed for all ages, from festive holiday celebrations, family fun days, and kids’ activities to engaging wine tastings, chef showcases, and lively poolside parties. Whether savoring a fine dining experience, gathering for a casual meal, or enjoying a fun-filled family day by the ocean, the Delray Beach Club provides the perfect setting for connection, entertainment, and coastal sophistication. A NEW ERA, A NEW VISION At the heart of this transformation is an extraordinary team, led by a dynamic new General Manager, Tracy Bradbury. With a fresh perspective and a passion for excellence, Tracy and the dedicated team are committed to delivering an unparalleled club experience—where tradition meets innovation, and every detail is crafted with our members in mind. “The new Delray Beach Club is more than a renovation—it’s a transformation of the member experience,” says Tracy Bradbury, General Manager. “With a commitment to both tradition and innovation, we are setting a new benchmark in coastal luxury, ensuring that every aspect of club life reflects our commitment to excellence.” Board President Mr. Tripp Rea echoes this excitement, stating, “The transformation of our Club is complete. A new facility, five-star oceanside dining, exciting new events, and an expansion of our family-oriented programming provides an experience for everyone. We are excited to welcome our Summer Members to the Beach Club Experience.” With refreshing breezes, an enhanced member experience, and a forward-thinking vision, the Delray Beach Club is where ocean views and elegance meet to form a premier seaside escape. ACTIVE LIVING AT THE DELRAY BEACH CLUB At The Delray Beach Club, staying active is part of the lifestyle, with premier tennis, fitness, and beachside amenities designed for both recreation and relaxation. Tennis enthusiasts can enjoy professional instruction, and programs for all skill levels, from private lessons to social matches. Fitness and wellness offerings include a redesigned fitness center, group classes, and personalized training for a well-rounded approach to health. Meanwhile, the beach concierge team ensures effortless oceanfront enjoyment, from lounge chair and umbrella service to refreshing cocktails delivered right to the sand. Whether you’re perfecting your serve, strengthening your body, or simply unwinding by the water, The Delray Beach Club offers a balanced, active lifestyle in a breathtaking coastal setting. A COASTAL EXPERIENCE FOR THE WHOLE FAMILY Life at The Delray Beach Club is about more than just a beautiful location—it’s about the moments shared, the traditions built, and the effortless joy of days spent by the ocean with family and friends. Whether its kids splashing in the pool, members enjoying a friendly match on the courts, or taking in a breathtaking sunset over dinner, every experience here is designed to bring generations together in a setting that feels like home. As we embrace this exciting new chapter, we look forward to welcoming familiar faces and new friends alike. The Delray Beach Club is more than a destination—it’s a coastal lifestyle for the whole family, and there’s never been a better time to be part of it. A limited number of summer memberships are still available for May 2025 – October 2025. The Club is also accepting members onto the waitlist for full-time membership. For more details contact Diane Roberts, DBC Membership Director, at droberts@thedelraybeachclub.com or call 561-278-6226. THE DELRAY BEACH CLUB 2001 S. Ocean Blvd. , Delray Beach , Florida 33483 Print Video Photos × 1 of 4 × 2 of 4 × 3 of 4 × 4 of 4 Prev Next Phone 561-278-6226 Visit Website The Delray Beach Club is a private member-owned Beach Club that sits on 3.5 acres of pristine oceanfront property overlooking the illustrious Atlantic Ocean. This exclusive Beach Club, that was recently renovated, has a history and heritage of over 40 years. A lot has changed in the past 40 years, but not our original premise of providing a nurturing, exciting, illuminating and social epicenter for like minds to gather for sun, surf, dining, intellectual pursuits, sports and fitness. Since its inception in 1969 the Delray Beach Club has remained a family oriented beach club with unlimited social and sporting activities for families, couples and singles of all ages. If you have children we have a kid’s camp as well as social and recreational sports and activities for young people. For adults the activities are endless. We have social events such as evening galas, holiday parties, themed dinners, cocktail parties, pool parties, happy hour and nightly entertainment. We also sponsor outings that are cultural and educational in nature, as well as excursions for those who like to explore the outer parameters of Florida. There are also many activities to challenge your more cerebral inner landscape. We have bridge games and lessons (also duplicate and twosomes), canasta, a book club, theater trips, luncheons, a lecture series, musical entertainment, holiday celebrations and other group activities for your entertainment and enlightenment. We also have a fitness facility to energize and exercise your most precious asset – Your Body. There are men’s and women's locker rooms, various massages and treatments, state-of-the-art fitness equipment, exercise classes, water aerobics, personal training sessions, Har-Tru® tennis courts (tennis instruction and tennis events), a gym attendant and other activities year round. We also have dining areas to fit your mood and lifestyle. They range from our Ocean Room (with a picture window overlooking the ocean) to our newly renovated Grille Room where Ernest Hemingway would have been proud to hold court. There is also a poolside bar, a newly constructed pavilion and kitchen with a pizza oven serving food 5 days a week. To help everyone get to know each other we have Friday night Mix and Mingle Events outside by the pool. It is there you can make new friends, enjoy old ones and trip the night fantastic under the stars!
